game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the mischievous imp, Puck.
game.description: The beloved family heirloom has gone missing, and it's up to you to retrieve it. Gather clues and outsmart Puck to restore the heirloom to its rightful owner.

task.objective: Talk to Goram's friend, Elara, about the last time she saw the heirloom.
task.description: Speak with Elara and gather information about the night the heirloom went missing. Ask her if she knows anything about Puck's whereabouts.

task.objective: Follow Puck to his secret hideout and retrieve the stolen heirloom.
task.description: Track down Puck's movements and infiltrate his secret hideout. Be prepared for a thrilling chase through the forest!
